page.title: 12NAIRN:RIDING
page.content: I go riding once a month at Owenmore stables.The stables are not far from the beach.The horses are all sizes so anyone can go.The instructor takes you away on a beach or woodland run.The cost is Â£4 per hour. The stables aren't very big,but they are building new stables and a ring for the horses.When you go out on the horse you have to tack up the hor- se.You then up to the woods and jump over logs,canter up hills.If you can gallop you can gallop up and down the beach too.The instructor tells you how you are doing. When you go back to the stables you have to groom your horse then go and pay for your ride.Sometimes in the summer if you like you can clean out the stables to earn a few free rides on the horses.
